channel.title: Client Working Compiler!
channel.description:
[code]@echo off :menu title RuneXC Compiler echo Errors: if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Compiling Finished. pause exit [/code]
I recommend using JDK 1.6.0_12! This compiler works fine, and if any errors, it will say the position (area) and what it is!
- I only want 6% credits because i edited some stuff. 1 echo internal command and some words ;). And 1% for posting it!

item.title: Client Working Compiler!
item.dc:creator: @x_power_x x power x
item.description:
@x_power_x wrote:

@echo off :menu title RuneXC Compiler echo Errors: if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Compiling Finished. pause exit

This compiler works fine, and if any errors, it will say the position (area) and what it is!
